title: I have a question for you Riot
body:
I would like to change my summoner name which is currently "Battle Meow" to "Naranjas de sangre" which means "Blood Oranges" since I play a lot of Gangplank, I have searched this summoner name on the  "check name" search, but it says it is not accepted and the requirements say nothing against the name I would like to change it to. I have checked OP.GG and it give me a random text box. It would be nice to have some help with this issue, if possible since this problem has been brought to light, a name change provided by Riot would be nice

                                                                                                                                                                               Sincerely, Battle Meow

replies.body:
It looks like you summoner name is too long, spaces included, in this situation. If you try a shorter summoner name, you shouldn't run into any further issues.

Be sure to check our [**Summoner Name FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ) out for more info on name requirements. If you have any other concerns, let me know.
